================================
### Government Tender Announcement: Acquisition of Safran Data Collection Unit

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-213-77447642
* **Solicitation Number:** T8493-23-0006
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-09
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-24 11:00:00

#### Tender Description

Transport Canada's Air Services Directorate seeks to acquire a Safran data collection Unit (Model 3075873-01) as part of the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series. The requirement is open to Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for procurement of the T8493-140035 series.

The solicitation is limited to the following companies:

* Pratt & Whitney Canada
* Aero Supplies Inc.
* Execaire Aviation Group
* Canada West Avionics Ltd
* Alpine Aerotech
* Bell Textron Canada

#### Procurement Method

This tender is a Competitive - Selective Tendering process, where the lowest cost-per-point will be the selection criteria.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions of Opportunity

This tender is specific to the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contact Information

For inquiries regarding the tender, please contact:

* Yula Zourdos
* Aircraft Services Directorate
* Transport Canada
* Building T-58, 200 Comet Private
* Ottawa, Ontario K1V 7B2
* Email: yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 552-8343

#### Notes

Please note that this is an on-going opportunity for qualification. A notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series.

You are also encouraged to submit your request to the Supply Arrangement Authority:

* Rick Long
* Public Services Procurement Canada
* Email: Rick.long@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
